question: Which city organized the BEEâ€™s International Workshop on Energy Efficient Cooling?
explanation: Bureau of Energy Efficiency (BEE), Ministry of Power, conducted an International Workshop on Energy Efficient Cooling from 12-13 December 2019 at Scope Convention Centre, New Delhi. It was organized as a part of the Energy Conservation Week that was observed from 9-14 December 2019. The workshop was conducted by BEE in association with the International Energy Agency (IEA) under the SEAD initiative of Clean Energy Ministerial (CEM).
